short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modify some styles of the Signaturit dashboard to improve usability.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will improve Signaturit's Dashboard screens by trying to make them more user-friendly and by fixing small design errors. Some styles are modified to achieve this end.
